name: World of Socks Tales
description:
Your new game,  "World of Socks Tales" is loading...

But the progress bar is so slow !

Smashing components is probably the best way to speed things up !

However, this is a subtle process:

Hiting green components will give a boost to the progress bar

Hitting red components will make you lose some progress

Hitting other components will pause the loading for a while


Silurius - Graphics, Music

Bellatrion - Dev, SFX

Made in 3 hours (each) for Trijam #176

Theme: Loading Process

BUG: If you go below 0.00%, you will be stuck at -6.66%, and no Game Over will be triggered. Unfortunately, a manual restart of the game is necessary.

Initially, it was possible to resume progress by hitting a green object, but this was broken in last minutes, sorry :)
